tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE ARNavigation (
  place_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  place_name VARCHAR(255),
  latitude FLOAT,
  longitude FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE routes (
  route_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  start_point VARCHAR(255),
  end_point VARCHAR(255),
  distance DECIMAL
)

CREATE TABLE waypoints (
  waypoint_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  location VARCHAR(255),
  time DATETIME
)

CREATE TABLE optimizations (
  optimization_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  route_id INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (route_id) REFERENCES routes(route_id),
  cost DECIMAL
)

CREATE TABLE Waypoints (
  waypoint_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  route_id INT,
  waypoint_name VARCHAR(255),
  latitude FLOAT,
  longitude FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE Stops (
  stop_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  waypoint_id INT,
  stop_name VARCHAR(255),
  arrival_time TIMESTAMP,
  departure_time TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE Routes (
    route_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    start_location_id INT NOT NULL,
    end_location_id INT NOT NULL,
    distance FLOAT NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (start_location_id) REFERENCES Locations(location_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (end_location_id) REFERENCES Locations(location_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Assignments (
    assignment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    vehicle_id INT NOT NULL,
    route_id INT NOT NULL,
    start_time DATETIME NOT NULL,
    end_time DATETIME NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (vehicle_id) REFERENCES Vehicles(vehicle_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (route_id) REFERENCES Routes(route_id)
);

CREATE TABLE JourneyLog (
    log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    assignment_id INT NOT NULL,
    event_description TEXT NOT NULL,
    event_time DATETIME NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (assignment_id) REFERENCES Assignments(assignment_id)
);
